content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu Wang, I'm glad you're interested in the apartment. I want to rent it out for the highest price possible. Let's negotiate the price. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. I am a smart and responsible student. I am not easily tricked. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you. I make a first offer of 300 Euro.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, but I want more. Let's continue negotiating. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mister Schmidt. I make a second offer of 350 Euro. I am smart and responsible. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Your second offer is still not enough. Let's continue negotiating. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. I make a third offer of 400 Euro. I am smart and responsible. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Your third offer is closer to my expectations, but I want more. Let's continue negotiating. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. I make a fourth offer of 450 Euro. I am smart and responsible. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Your fourth offer is even closer to my expectations, but I want more. Let's continue negotiating. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. I make a fifth offer of 500 Euro. I am smart and responsible. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I accept your fifth offer. I agree to the price of 500 Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
